testcase.classname: Test the basic search functionality of Wikipedia advanced search
testcase.name: Valid search terms should return search results - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am at the advanced search page of Wikipedia.........................passed When I input a search term "test" in the search box.........................passed And I click the search button...............................................passed Then I should verify the status "true" of the search........................passed

testcase.name: I can see search suggestions for valid search terms - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am at the advanced search page of Wikipedia.........................passed When I input a search term "face" in the search box.........................passed And I input a space and a little delay......................................passed Then Search suggestions should be displayed.................................passed And Suggestions should contain suggestion "facebook"........................passed

testcase.name: User sees no suggestions for invalid search terms - Example #1.1
